title: Sunlit Whisper
description: This delicate blend of citrus and white florals, featuring notes of sparkling bergamot, delicate jasmine, and a touch of creamy sandalwood, creates a light and airy daytime scent. Perfect for a woman who wants to feel fresh and radiant throughout the day.

title: Urban Pulse
description: A vibrant mix of woody and spicy notes, Urban Pulse creates a bold and energetic fragrance. Top notes of crisp cardamom and invigorating grapefruit give way to a heart of warm cedarwood and a touch of smoky vetiver. The base of musk and amber adds depth and sophistication, making this a perfect scent for both men and women who want to leave a lasting impression.
